claim: Mike Judge is a method actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Michael Craig `` Mike '' Judge  (  born October 17 , 1962  )  is an American actor , animator , writer , producer , director , and musician .

claim: Mike Judge is a method actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Judge is the creator of the television series Beavis and Butt-Head  (  1993 -- 1997 , 2011  )  , co-creator of the television series King of the Hill  (  1997 -- 2010  )  , The Goode Family  (  2009  )  , and Silicon Valley  (  2014 -- present  )  .

claim: Mike Judge is a method actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He also wrote and directed the films Beavis and Butt-Head Do America  (  1996  )  , Office Space  (  1999  )  , Idiocracy  (  2006  )  and Extract  (  2009  )  .

claim: Mike Judge is a method actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Judge graduated from University of California , San Diego , where he studied physics .

claim: Mike Judge is a method actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: After becoming uninterested in his career in science , Judge began to experiment with animation and started to create his own short films .

claim: Mike Judge is a method actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Finding success in his animated shorts , Judge began to develop one of his most popular shorts which would later become Beavis and Butt-Head .

claim: Mike Judge is a method actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The show was critically acclaimed by both audiences and critics , and launched the spin-off series Daria and the feature film Beavis and Butt-Head Do America .

claim: Mike Judge is a method actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 1995 , Judge and former Simpsons writer Greg Daniels developed King of the Hill , which quickly became a hit with both critics and audiences .

claim: Mike Judge is a method actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: During the run of the show , Judge took some time off to write and direct Office Space , Idiocracy , and Extract .

claim: Mike Judge is a method actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: As King of the Hill was coming to an end , Judge created his third show titled The Goode Family , which received mixed reviews and was cancelled after 13 episodes .

claim: Mike Judge is a method actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: After a four-year hiatus , Judge created his fourth show Silicon Valley , which has received critical acclaim since its premiere .

claim: Mike Judge is a method actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Judge has won a Primetime Emmy Award and two Annie Awards for King of the Hill and two Critics ' Choice Television Awards and Satellite Awards for Silicon Valley .

claim: Mike Judge is a method actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: On January 12 , 2017 , Deadline confirmed that Cinemax ordered 8 episodes of Judge 's new animated series , Mike Judge Presents : Tales from the Tour Bus .

claim: Mike Judge is a method actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: It is set to premiere in 2017 .

claim: Mike Judge is a method actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The 1999 film Office Space was based upon the cartoons , and featured actor Stephen Root in the role of Milton Waddams .

claim: Mike Judge is a method actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Although Milton was the title character from the shorts , the role was a supporting character in the Office Space movie , as was his boss , Bill Lumbergh  (  played by actor Gary Cole in Office Space  )  .

claim: Mike Judge is a method actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Beavis and Butt-Head : The Mike Judge Collection is a series of three-disc DVD sets from MTV and Paramount Home Entertainment , each containing 40 Beavis and Butt-Head episodes handpicked by series creator Mike Judge plus supplements .

claim: Mike Judge is a method actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Like Mike Judge 's early Beavis and Butt-head shorts , the film was funded by Spike and Mike and shown on MTV 's Liquid Television in the early 1990s .

claim: Mike Judge is a method actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Good Vibes was cancelled in February 2012 due to low ratings , on the same day the DVD came out , Beavis and Butt-head finished its run in December 2011 and was not renewed  (  Mike Judge said in January 2014 that he might pitch the show to another network  )  , and Worst Friends Forever never ran .
